title: After replacing black glass, Pixel 2 bluetooth lost range. How can I fix it?
content:
Hello everybody.

I bought a Pixel 2 a couple years ago, and after an accident I had to replace the back glass. I live on Brazil and there is not one place that repairs Pixels, so my only option was to buy a replacement from the internet and do it myself.

After I replaced the glass, bluetooth stopped working properly. I tested with multiple devices, and the range is now very short.

Any idea how I can solve the problem? Thanks!
